page.title: 04YOXALL TRADE (continued)
page.content: Continuing from the Golden Cup public house,past a group of cottages is the Auto-body car repairs workshop. Next,with attractive gardens to the rear,comes the Tudor food stores and cafe. Evidence of coal fires being still in use is reflected by the name plate of the Electric Chimney ZSweeping Service. In a modern block is the Yoxall village newsagent and newly established Building Society Branch Office,next to the hairdressers. Beside the bridge at the base of Town Hill is Lester's Garage,opposite the Crown public house Crossing to the right of Main St.we pass the Veterinary surgery and reach the imposing Queen Anne house of the Armson family antiques business. Past the telephone exchange is the Leavlite Anodising Plant,opposite the Meadow Lane Nursery (supplying retail trade )
